CyberScraper 2077 is an AI-powered Python web scraping tool that leverages advanced LLMs like OpenAI and Gemini, along with local Ollama models, to extract data with high precision. It features a user-friendly Streamlit interface, supports various export formats, and includes advanced functionalities like Tor network integration, stealth mode, and captcha bypassing.

âœ… Code Editor with syntax highlighting, error highlighting, autocompletion, project indexing, line numbers, breakpoints, image viewing, multiple tabs, find/replace.

âœ… Search and navigation features like Find in Files, Go to Class/Symbol/File, Recent Files, Find Usages, and Action Search.
âœ… Project management for Gradle, Maven, pure Java, and IntelliJ IDEA projects, including project creation and class generation.
âœ… Code diagnostics and analysis using javac, with real-time error/warning highlighting and Quick Fixes.
âœ… Run and build capabilities with support for multiple entry points and project type detection.
